<Text: The Japan Record Award for Best New Artist (最優秀新人賞 ) is awarded annually.>

1:
--------------------
Text: Japan Record Award for Best New Artist:  Until the 10th Japan Record Awards it was called New Artist Award, since 11th — Best New Artist Award.

Triplets:<Japan Record Award
2:
--------------------
Text: Japan Record Award for Best New Artist:  At present all nominees for the Best New Artist Award are awarded the New Artist Award.
